name: Deeper & Dipper
description:
The two twins, Deeper & Dipper,  want to Drill until they find the centre of Earth.

They were told that there's dinosaurs over there, but will they reach the centre ?

The answer is no! because we go deeper and deeper... but don't tell them.

To play you need to connect 2 distinct controllers (keyboard/gamepad or gamepad/gamepad) during the title screen and then press the "play" button.
